messageTypes.description: Travelor Information Message indicating the active Work Zone information.

configuration.description: The frequency to send the TIM in milliseconds.
The interval in milliseconds to keep a vehicle within a zone before allowing it to transition out of all zones.
Timeout in milliseconds when a vehicle is removed from all zones if a BSM has not been received.
The Start Broadcast Date for the TIM message in the (mm-dd-YYYY) format.
The Stop Broadcast Date for the TIM message in the (mm-dd-YYYY) format.
The Start Broadcast Time for the TIM message in the (HH:MM:SS) format.
The Start Broadcast Time for the TIM message in the (HH:MM:SS) format.
